H0.text: Which English football club won the FA Cup Final in 1946, the first after World War Two. Derby County

H1.text: Which English football club won the FA Cup Final in 1946, the first after World War Two. Bolton Wanderers

H2.text: Which English football club won the FA Cup Final in 1946, the first after World War Two. Charlton Athletic

H3.text: Which English football club won the FA Cup Final in 1946, the first after World War Two. Rammie

A4.text: Derby won the match 4â€“1 after extra time.

A5.text: Charlton's Bert Turner scored an own goal and then scored for his own team, thus becoming the first player to score for both sides in an FA Cup Final.
